divs: Sighting DetailsI live in Riverside,California and the reason I decided to post this picture on a forum (Generally a ufo site) is to find an explanation to this object I caught with my camera. I decided to take pictures of clouds to put it in my desktop when I noticed a bright object on the sky above the hill after I took the pictures without knowing that there was an object in the sky. It does not look like any aircraft that I know of or a bird and if you look closely a redish trail is visible. I took 3 pictures of this (the last one came alittle blureish) and if anyone has any idea of what this object can be please respond. (The picture is pretty big,I use a Sony 7.2 Megapixel Cybershot)
Summary: A bright Circle above a hill leaving a trail.
